title: LF players/manager/coach for a clash team/aspiring OCS
body:
Hi, looking for players (Diamond 5 peak minimum) to join a future clash team, and work to achieve a spot in the OCS. Tournaments will be played regularly, alongside with scrims.

We are looking for all players so feel free to check out our form and apply if you're interested!

https://goo.gl/forms/CgZkbuJfSiZDHqeg2 

LINK: www.goo.gl/forms/CgZkbuJfSiZDHqeg2)

replies.body: you fill it out within the tiny picture
was just trying to help. some people actually do that
